abstract: Report from the Congressional Budget Office showing that the top 1 percent of earners more than doubled their share of the nation's income over the last three decades is likely to figure prominently in the escalating political fight over the economy.
snippet: A new report from the Congressional Budget Office is likely to figure prominently in the escalating political fight over the economy.
lead_paragraph: A new report from the Congressional Budget Office is likely to figure prominently in the escalating political fight over the economy.

headline.main: Top Earners Doubled Share of Nation’s Income, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: It’s Official: The Rich Get Richer
headline.seo: Top Earners Doubled Share of Nation’s Income, C.B.O. Says
